pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, October 7, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, October 7, 2016:

Toronto, Ontario

8:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will join Thomson Reuters for an important announcement and will hold a joint media availability with Kathleen Wynne, Premier of Ontario, John Tory, Mayor of Toronto and Jim Smith, President and Chief Executive Officer of Thomson Reuters.

Thomson Reuters Customer Service Centre,
29th Floor
333 Bay Street
Toronto, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 7:45 a.m.
  • Media should arrive via the east side lobby for registration


9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an interview for the “Reuters Newsmakers” series.

Thomson Reuters Customer Service Centre,
29th Floor
333 Bay Street
Toronto, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Livestream of the interview available here: reuters.com/newsmakers or https://www.facebook.com/Reuters/?fref=ts


Kitchener, Ontario

11:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Kitchener-Waterloo Oktoberfest. 

Kitchener City Hall
200 King Street West
Kitchener, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 11:00 a.m.


Markham, Ontario

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a discussion with members of the Chinese community media.


PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
